Class ViewportEvent.RenderFog

java.lang.Object
net.minecraftforge.eventbus.internal.MutableEventInternals
net.minecraftforge.eventbus.api.event.MutableEvent
net.minecraftforge.client.event.ViewportEvent
net.minecraftforge.client.event.ViewportEvent.RenderFog
All Implemented Interfaces:
net.minecraftforge.eventbus.api.event.characteristic.Cancellable, net.minecraftforge.eventbus.api.event.InheritableEvent, net.minecraftforge.eventbus.internal.Event, net.minecraftforge.eventbus.internal.EventCharacteristic
Enclosing class:
ViewportEvent
public static final class ViewportEvent.RenderFog extends ViewportEvent implements net.minecraftforge.eventbus.api.event.characteristic.Cancellable
Fired for rendering custom fog. The plane distances are based on the player's render distance.

This event is

invalid reference 
cancellable
, and
invalid reference 
has a result
.
The event must be cancelled for any changes to the plane distances to take effect.

This event is fired on the main Forge event bus, only on the logical client.
